known_issues: App UI incorrectly displays content related to bands/shows/venues instead of social networking features

existing_features.title: Remove all UI elements, text, and references related to booking bands, shows, venues, concerts, tour dates, event listings, or ticketing from the frontend application
Ensure all user-facing text and UI elements clearly communicate that MetalHead Underground is a social networking platform for 21+ metal/rock/punk fans to connect, share posts, and make friends

new_feature_requests.summary: Verify that all existing social networking features (user profiles with favorite bands/genres, friend requests, social feed with posts/likes/comments, blocking, reporting) are correctly displayed and functional in the UI
